sentences.sentence: The biggest difference between passages is 11.8% and 26.6% of the minimum flow-rate irrespectively.
sentences.translation: 当压力比相同时，两个换向阀不同通道流量的最大差值分别为其最小流量的11.8%和26.6%。

sentences.sentence: Apart from a few exceptions, the services will be offered irrespectively of the persons' income or capital - a universal right.
sentences.translation: 除了少量的例外之外，提供服务时不考虑残疾人的收入或资本——即一种普遍权利。

sentences.sentence: The thinning drawing force is calculated through deforming work method and slip-line method irrespectively, and the results are compared in this paper.
sentences.translation: 本文用变形功法和滑移线法分别求解变薄拉深力，并将两种方法的计算结果进行了比较。
